Parameters.Name: 6.4.3 NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE ERROR CASE

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE
Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: Check NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return correct response.

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE
Test.Name: No response on first CreateUsers request
Test.Description: Check NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return No response on first CreateUsers request.

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE
Test.Name: Fault on first CreateUsers request (TooManyUsers)
Test.Description: Check NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return Fault on first CreateUsers request (TooManyUsers).

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE
Test.Name: Fault on first CreateUsers request
Test.Description: Check NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return wrong Fault on first CreateUsers request.

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE
Test.Name: Correct response: more users than created on first GetUsers
Test.Description: Check NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return correct response.

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE
Test.Name: Wrong response: no users on first GetUsers
Test.Description: Check NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return wrong response (no users on first GetUsers).

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE
Test.Name: Wrong response: wrong user role on first GetUsers
Test.Description: Check NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return wrong response (wrong user role on first GetUsers).

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE
Test.Name: No response on second CreateUsers
Test.Description: Check NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return No response on second CreateUsers.

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE
Test.Name: Wrong Fault on second CreateUsers (TooManyUsers)
Test.Description: Check NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return Wrong Fault on second CreateUsers (TooManyUsers).

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE
Test.Name: Normal response instead of fault on second CreateUsers
Test.Description: Check NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return No response on second CreateUsers.

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE
Test.Name: No response on last CreateUsers
Test.Description: Check NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return No response on last CreateUsers.

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE
Test.Name: Wrong Fault on last CreateUsers (TooManyUsers)
Test.Description: Check NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return Wrong Fault on last CreateUsers (TooManyUsers).

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE
Test.Name: Normal response instead of fault on second CreateUsers
Test.Description: Check NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return No response on second CreateUsers.

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE
Test.Name: Wrong response: no OnvifTest1 on second GetUsers
Test.Description: Check NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return wrong response (no OnvifTest1 on second GetUsers).

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE
Test.Name: Wrong response: OnvifTest4 on second GetUsers
Test.Description: Check NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return wrong response (OnvifTest4 on second GetUsers).

Test.Name: Wrong response: OnvifTest1 haas wrong UserLevel on second GetUsers
Test.Description: Check NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return wrong response (OnvifTest1 haas wrong UserLevel on second GetUsers).

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE
Test.Name: No response on second GetUsers
Test.Description: Check NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return No response on second GetUsers.

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE
Test.Name: Fault on second GetUsers
Test.Description: Check NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE test when DUT return Fault on second GetUsers.

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE

Test.TestName: NVT SECURITY COMMAND CREATEUSERS ERROR CASE
Test.Name: Fault on recovery DeleteUsers
